press.title: Xovxwm

press.contactText: Yog muaj lus nug rau xovxwm, sau rau press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia yog ib lub messenger muaj kev ruaj ntseg nrog kev txhais lus tam sim thiab E2E encryption, tsim los pab kom kev sib tham thoob ntiaj teb muaj kev ntiag tug thiab yooj yim.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, thiab duab khoom (muaj tuaj sai sai no).

careers.title: Kev Ua Haujlwm
careers.intro: Peb yog ib pab pawg me tab tom tsim ib lub messenger ntiag tug, thoob ntiaj teb. Yog koj saib xyuas kev encryption, kev nkag siv, thiab UX zoo siab, peb xav hnov ntawm koj.
careers.openRoles: Chaw qhib: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Yuav thov li cas: Email koj daim resume/links rau jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Txog Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia yog ib lub messenger ntau hom lus nrog end-to-end encryption, txhais lus tam sim, thiab hu suab/yeej suab. Peb lub hom phiaj yog yooj yim: pab neeg txuas ntxiv—nyab xeeb, ntiag tug, thiab dhau los ntawm lus sib txawv.

values.privacy: Kev ntiag tug ua ntej: E2E encryption los ntawm lub neej ntawd.
values.access: Nkag tau rau txhua tus: Txhais lus cia li 100+ hom lus.
values.control: Kev tswj: Lus ploj lawm & ntawv lees nyeem yog xaiv tau.

about.howDescription: Cov lus raug encrypted hauv koj lub khoom siv ua ntej xa tawm. Kev txhais lus, thaub qab, thiab sync khoom siv raug tsim kom peb cov servers pom tsawg kawg nkaus.

advertise.title: Tshaj tawm nrog Chatforia
advertise.description: Mus cuag cov neeg siv messenger nquag nrog cov chaw tso ntawv hwm hom. Peb muaj banner hauv qhov chaw pom tseeb, kev txhawb nqa, thiab house promos. Cov neeg sau npe Premium tsis pom tshaj tawm.

adsense.withPubId: Tam sim no peb siv Google AdSense. Yog koj xav tsom peb hauv Google Ads, siv publisher ID {{pubId}} thiab thov managed placement rau peb cov unit hauv qab no. Muaj kev txhawb ncaj qha—siv daim foos.
adsense.noPubId: Tam sim no peb siv Google AdSense. Muaj kev txhawb ncaj qha thiab—siv daim foos hauv qab no.

advertise.noPlacements: Tsis tau teem chaw tso ntxiv. Ntxiv rau hauv ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Zaus siv siab thiab nyob ntev hauv chat UI
why.brandSafe: Hom-nyab xeeb; tswj zaus tshwm sim kom hwm
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponsored moments (piv txwv, “Start a Chat” modal) muaj
why.deals: Kev cog lus ncaj qha los yog programmatic los ntawm AdSense/Google Ads

gettingStarted.title: Pib Siv
gettingStarted.subtitle: Tshiab rau Chatforia? Daim no yuav qhia yam tseem ceeb kom koj pib siv tau hauv ob peb feeb.

alert.text: Phau qhia no yuav loj hlob ntxiv thaum peb tso tawm yam tshiab. Yog tsis muaj yam koj xav tau, qhia rau peb los ntawm

section1.title: 1) Tsim koj account
section1.loginText: nrog koj account twb muaj lawm.

section2.title: 2) Pib xa lus
section2.item1: Tsim DM lossis Pab Pawg thiab xa koj thawj qho lus.
section2.item2: Siv kev txhais lus tam sim los sib tham hla 100+ hom lus.
section2.item3: Sim lus ploj lawm thiab ntawv lees nyeem hauv Profile → Kev Ntiag Tug.

section3.title: 3) Mus deb dua
section3.item1Part1: Tswj koj txoj kev npaj hauv
section3.item1Part2: nplooj (Plus = tsis muaj tshaj tawm, Premium = yam muaj zog).
section3.item2Part1: Txuas ntxiv lwm yam khoom siv thiab teeb thaub qab encrypted hauv

account.q: Yuav tsim lossis rov tau kuv account li cas?
account.a: Rub lub app lossis siv web, nias “Tsim account”, xyuas koj email/xov tooj. Yuav rov qab, siv “Tsis nco lo lus zais”.

privacy.q: Cov lus puas muaj end-to-end encryption?
privacy.a: Yog. Cov lus thiab hu muaj end-to-end encryption los ntawm lub neej ntawd. Tsuas yog koj thiab tus txais thiaj nyeem tau.

translate.q: Kev txhais lus tam sim ua haujlwm li cas?
translate.a: Qhib “Txhais lus cia li” hauv Chaw Teeb Tsa → Kev Zoo Saib & Lus. Peb txhais hauv-khoom siv thaum tau, yog tsis tau ces los ntawm API uas muaj kev nyab xeeb nrog cov ntaub ntawv tsawg kawg nkaus.

contact.a: Tiv tauj peb ntawm support@chatforia.com. Ntxiv screenshots thiab koj qhov version app.

contact.title: Tiv Tauj Peb
contact.successMsg: Ua tsaug—peb pab neeg yuav teb los ntawm email.
contact.errorSend: Xa tsis tau. Thov email rau support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Kev Cai Ntiag Tug no piav qhia tias Chatforia (“peb”) khaws, siv, thiab qhia ntaub ntawv li cas thaum koj siv peb cov apps thiab kev pab. Peb tsim Chatforia kom peb pom tau cov ntaub ntawv tsawg kawg nkaus.

infoWeCollect.title: Ntaub ntawv peb khaws
infoWeCollect.account: Ntaub ntawv account (piv txwv, email/xov tooj) los tsim thiab tiv thaiv koj account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Cov ntsiab lus encrypted (lus/hu) yog end-to-end; peb nyeem tsis tau.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostics/siv xws li crash logs, hom khoom siv, lossis analytics me me los txhim kho kev ua haujlwm.

howWeUse.title: Peb siv ntaub ntawv li cas
howWeUse.provide: Muab thiab tiv thaiv kev pab (auth, nrhiav spam/kev tsim txom).
howWeUse.improve: Txhim kho yam (zoo txhais lus, ntseeg tau).

sharing.title: Kev sib qhia
sharing.body: Peb tsis muag ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Peb tej zaum tuaj yeem qhia me ntsis rau cov koom tes ua haujlwm (piv txwv, push, analytics) raws li kev cog lus nruj.

rights.title: Koj txoj cai
rights.body: Nyob ntawm koj cheeb tsam (piv txwv, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), koj yuav thov nkag, kho kom raug, rho tawm, lossis tsis kam qee yam kev ua. Tiv tauj: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Khaws cia & kev ruaj ntseg
retention.body: Peb tsuas khaws yam tsim nyog los khiav kev pab thiab siv kev ruaj ntseg raws kev lag luam. Cov ntsiab lus E2E peb tsis tuaj yeem qhib tau.

children.title: Menyuam yaus
children.body: Chatforia tsis npaj rau menyuam yaus qis dua 13 xyoos (lossis raws koj txoj cai hauv zos).

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav tshaj tawm hloov kho ntawm no thiab hloov “Hloov kho kawg” hnub.

contact.title: Tiv tauj
contact.body: privacy@chatforia.com • [Lub npe tuam txhab raug cai], [Chaw nyob]

intro.body: Thaum koj siv Chatforia ces koj pom zoo rau cov Qauv Cai no. Yog koj tsis pom zoo, thov tsis txhob siv kev pab.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Muab ntaub ntawv raug thiab khaws tus lej nkag kom nyab xeeb.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Koj yog tus saib xyuas yam ua hauv koj account.

acceptableUse.title: Kev siv raug cai
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tsis pub muaj yam txhaum cai, tsim txom, lossis rhuav cai; tsis pub spam lossis siv cuab yeej automated.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Peb yuav txiav/txiav txim thaum muaj kev ua txhaum.

yourContent.title: Koj cov ntsiab lus
yourContent.body: Koj tuav cai ntawm koj cov ntsiab lus. Koj pub rau peb cov cai tsim nyog los khiav kev pab (piv txwv, xa, cia, txhais lus).

disclaimer.title: Kev tsis lees paub & lub luag hauj lwm
disclaimer.body: Kev pab muab “raws li muaj” tsis muaj kev cog lus. Raws li txoj cai pub, Chatforia tsis lav rau kev puas tsuaj ncaj tsis mus ncaj qha lossis cuam tshuam.

changes.title: Kev hloov
changes.body: Peb yuav hloov cov cai no; kev siv txuas ntxiv txhais tau tias koj lees txais.

contact.title: Tiv tauj
contact.body: support@chatforia.com • [Lub npe tuam txhab raug cai], [Chaw nyob]

doNotSell.title: Tsis Muag lossis Sib Qhia Kuv Cov Ntaub Ntawv Tus Kheej
doNotSell.body: Chatforia tsis muag ntaub ntawv tus kheej. Cov neeg nyob California tseem tuaj yeem xa kev thov raws CPRA siv lub khawm hauv qab no.

cookies.title: Chaw Teem Ncuav Qab Zib
cookies.body: Chatforia siv ncuav qab zib me me xwb (piv txwv, session, kev ruaj ntseg). Peb tsis siv ncuav qab zib tshaj tawm sab thib peb. Koj tswj tau ncuav qab zib hauv chaw teeb tsa ntawm koj browser.
